author.name: ClickUp
author.description: Save time with the all-in-one productivity platform that brings teams, tasks, and tools together in one place.

html:
10/ Make a closing remark

Before your peers sign off, briefly go over the immediate next steps

How and when you will follow up, deliverables, and the timeline moving forward

Pro tip: ClickUp can help you delegate action items so you can jump on these tasks

author.name: ClickUp
author.description: Save time with the all-in-one productivity platform that brings teams, tasks, and tools together in one place.

html:
9/ Leave space for questions 🙋‍♀️

Build the Q&A portion of your meeting into the agenda

Pro tip: encourage your meeting participants to reach out with questions or ideas when the meeting has come to a close

author.name: ClickUp
author.description: Save time with the all-in-one productivity platform that brings teams, tasks, and tools together in one place.

html:
8/ Long meeting? Schedule breaks

If you just know the meeting will be a doozy, schedule time in the agenda for a quick break

Brief breaks will help everyone stay in good spirits

Set your timer in ClickUp for five minutes and pop open your bevy of choice 🧃 https://t.co/CsRFhjhbiO

author.name: ClickUp
author.description: Save time with the all-in-one productivity platform that brings teams, tasks, and tools together in one place.

html:
7/ Keep note-taking to a minimum 📝

Stick to the key conversation points & review the meeting minutes later

A major benefit of virtual meetings is the ability to record the meeting

But you should designate a member of your team to take notes anyway

(We have a template) https://t.co/lt6VHHZEy1

author.name: ClickUp
author.description: Save time with the all-in-one productivity platform that brings teams, tasks, and tools together in one place.

html:
6/ Know when to speak & when to listen 📣

- Speak with confidence, but keep it concise
- Avoid repeating yourself or driving the point home too hard
- Keep your mic on mute unless you’re told otherwise or speaking

author.name: ClickUp
author.description: Save time with the all-in-one productivity platform that brings teams, tasks, and tools together in one place.

html:
4/ Dress for success 👚

Whether in the office or online, dressing appropriately is so important

Avoid distracting jewelry and patterns that won’t translate well on video

Virtual meeting wardrobe should align with the tone of the meeting

author.name: ClickUp
author.description: Save time with the all-in-one productivity platform that brings teams, tasks, and tools together in one place.

html:
3/ Be respectful of each other’s time 🙏

The same rule applies to meeting attendees—don’t keep your host waiting

If you’re someone who sometimes struggles with time management, use ClickUp to set a Reminder https://t.co/SXU8rnOHIA

author.name: ClickUp
author.description: Save time with the all-in-one productivity platform that brings teams, tasks, and tools together in one place.

html:
2/ Prepared meeting agenda 📝

We cannot stress it enough—prepare, prepare, prepare

Have a plan for the meeting before it starts and create an agenda 

Come prepared with an agenda that is specific to your situation https://t.co/KHreXQUOxI

author.name: ClickUp
author.description: Save time with the all-in-one productivity platform that brings teams, tasks, and tools together in one place.

html:
1/ Know your meeting platform 👩‍💻

If you’re hosting the meeting, be confident in using the software

Ensure the platform supports creating break-out rooms, screen sharing, or collaboration

Using dynamic meeting management software like ClickUp

author.name: ClickUp
author.description: Save time with the all-in-one productivity platform that brings teams, tasks, and tools together in one place.

html:
Why is meeting etiquette important?

Because our time is vital ⚡️

Thoughtful virtual meeting etiquette leaves plenty of time to listen, think, and respond to each other https://t.co/y7BJ9gTfmZ

author.name: ClickUp
author.description: Save time with the all-in-one productivity platform that brings teams, tasks, and tools together in one place.

html:
Virtual meeting etiquette sets the bar for how teams and leaders are to conduct themselves 

There are significant differences between virtual and in-person meetings

The following tips are good rules of thumb for making a positive impression https://t.co/DDVHT8fMBT

author.name: ClickUp
author.description: Save time with the all-in-one productivity platform that brings teams, tasks, and tools together in one place.

html:
Remember that saying...

Treat others the way you want to be treated

Well, meeting etiquette follows a similar train of thought

author.name: ClickUp
author.description: Save time with the all-in-one productivity platform that brings teams, tasks, and tools together in one place.

html:
The average person spends at least 3 hours a week in meetings.😱

That's a lot of meetings, but it's the new norm! 

Learn modern meeting manners and 10 essential rules for any virtual meeting:👇
